subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson raced to victory at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia to take the Chase for the Sprint Cup points lead with three events left, holding off Kyle Busch on a restart with five laps to go.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson raced to victory at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia to take the Chase for the Sprint Cup points lead with three events left, holding off Kyle Busch on a restart with five laps to go.
